en.slide1-text: The perfect destination for your dream vacation.
en.slide2-heading: Experience calm and luxury at Bali Resort.
en.slide3-heading: We are delighted to welcome you to Bali Resort.
en.slide3-text: Where every moment is designed specifically for your comfort.
en.luxury-suite-text: Experience the best luxury in our spacious suites.
en.deluxe-room-text: Comfortable and elegant rooms with a stunning view.
en.dining-description: Enjoy world-class dining at our beachfront restaurants.
en.review-text: "We are presently staying in the most luxurious resort we have ever been to. The Bali resort Nusa Dua Beach Resort is a most wonderful place to have a holiday. The resort is so beautiful and has the highest quality facilities."
en.review-text-2: "As much as I enjoyed the overall stay, the hotel is lacking a convenience store for snacks and beverages, and the bed in the room has obviously sunk in too much for a comfortable sleep."
en.review-text-3: "Amazing hotel in Nusa Dua. Family friendly and luxurious. Rooms are as per the photos, super clean and spacious. Definitely recommend this hotel if you are planning a trip to Bali away from the hustle and bustle of Kuta."
en.review-text-4: "The hotel location in Nusa Dua is excellent. There's plenty in the resort to entertain and feed you, and if you want more, you can stroll along the beach to any of the other restaurants or resorts. Everything was good!!!"
en.review-text-5: "We enjoyed our stay at Sofitel Nusa Dua!! Thank you for the amazing service and big shoutout to Ravael for making our stay special and memorable. Will definitely come back and stay."
en.luxury-vacation-description: Experience the luxury that embodies French inspiration at Sofitel Bali Nusa Dua Beach Resort, a prestigious 5-star beachfront sanctuary with beautiful tropical gardens and elegant modern architecture. As part of the MyResorts program offering exclusive experiences for ALL members, this magnificent resort features 413 exceptional rooms, including 39 suites and villas, along with a variety of resort facilities.
en.luxury-vacation-description-2: Enjoy a culinary journey at three restaurants and two bars, rejuvenate at Sofitel FITNESS and Sofitel SPA, and delight in the indoor and outdoor kids' club. Additionally, the resort features 24 function rooms, including a Grand Ballroom and Beachside Hall. Discover the finest arts experience at Club Millésime, where delicious dishes, exquisite wines, and stunning views of Nusa Dua await you.
en.room-01-amenities: Ocean view | Non-smoking | Television | Internet Access | Hairdryer | Air conditioned
en.room-01-description: Experience stunning ocean views in this elegant room, featuring a king-size bed and modern amenities. Perfect for couples or small families, this room combines luxury and comfort.
en.unavailable-dates-message: Thu, 26 Sept – Fri, 27 Sept are unavailable
en.luxury-room-features-2: Ocean view | Non-smoking | Television | Internet Access | Hairdryer | Air conditioned
en.luxury-room-description-2: This room offers contemporary decor with breathtaking ocean views, ideal for guests who appreciate modern luxury and comfort.
en.unavailable-dates-message-2: Thu, 29 Sept – Fri, 30 Sept are unavailable
en.prestige-suite-features: Sea view | Non-smoking | Private pool | Television | Internet Access | Air conditioned
en.prestige-suite-description: This luxurious room features a spacious layout with stunning sea views and access to a private pool, providing the ultimate retreat for families or friends.
en.unavailable-dates-message-3: Thu, 26 Sept – Fri, 27 Sept are unavailable
en.room-description-4: This spacious room boasts 2 luxurious bedrooms, a private pool, and direct access to the beach, making it a perfect choice for larger groups seeking comfort and relaxation.
en.unavailable-dates-message-4: Thu, 26 Sept – Fri, 27 Sept are unavailable
en.room-description-5: This upscale room provides a luxurious experience with modern decor, 2 bedrooms, and ample space for relaxation and entertainment.
en.unavailable-dates-message-5: Thu, 26 Sept – Fri, 27 Sept are unavailable
en.room-description-6: This stunning oceanfront room offers breathtaking views, luxurious amenities, and ample space for a relaxing getaway.

en.room-description-7: This luxurious suite features spacious living areas, stunning ocean views, and high-end amenities for an unforgettable stay.

id.slide1-heading: Halo! Selamat datang di Bali Resort
id.slide1-text: Destinasi sempurna untuk liburan impian Anda.
id.slide2-heading: Rasakan ketenangan dan kemewahan di Bali Resort.
id.slide2-text: Liburan impian Anda dimulai di sini.
id.slide3-heading: Kami dengan senang hati menyambut Anda di Bali Resort.
id.slide3-text: Di mana setiap momen dirancang khusus untuk kenyamanan Anda.
id.luxury-suite-text: Rasakan kemewahan terbaik di suite luas kami.
id.deluxe-room-text: Kamar yang nyaman dan elegan dengan pemandangan menakjubkan.
id.dining-description: Nikmati pengalaman makan kelas dunia di restoran tepi pantai kami.
id.review-text: "Kami saat ini menginap di resor paling mewah yang pernah kami kunjungi. Bali Resort Nusa Dua Beach Resort adalah tempat yang sangat luar biasa untuk berlibur. Resor ini sangat indah dan memiliki fasilitas berkualitas tertinggi."
id.review-text-2: "Sebanyak saya menikmati keseluruhan menginap, hotel ini kekurangan toko serba ada untuk camilan dan minuman, dan tempat tidur di kamar sudah jelas tenggelam terlalu dalam untuk tidur yang nyaman."
id.review-text-3: "Hotel yang luar biasa di Nusa Dua. Ramah keluarga dan mewah. Kamar sesuai dengan foto, sangat bersih dan luas. Sangat merekomendasikan hotel ini jika Anda merencanakan perjalanan ke Bali jauh dari hiruk-pikuk Kuta."
id.review-text-4: "Lokasi hotel di Nusa Dua sangat baik. Ada banyak hal di resor untuk menghibur dan memberi Anda makan, dan jika Anda ingin lebih banyak, Anda dapat berjalan di sepanjang pantai ke restoran atau resor lainnya. Semuanya bagus!!!"
id.review-text-5: "Kami menikmati masa tinggal kami di Sofitel Nusa Dua!! Terima kasih atas layanan yang luar biasa dan penghargaan besar kepada Ravael karena telah membuat masa tinggal kami istimewa dan berkesan. Pasti akan kembali dan menginap."
id.luxury-vacation-description: Nikmati kemewahan yang mewakili inspirasi Prancis di Sofitel Bali Nusa Dua Beach Resort, sebuah tempat perlindungan tepi pantai 5 bintang bergengsi dengan taman tropis yang indah dan arsitektur modern yang elegan. Sebagai bagian dari program MyResorts yang menawarkan pengalaman eksklusif bagi anggota ALL, resor megah ini menyediakan 413 kamar yang luar biasa, termasuk 39 suite dan vila, serta berbagai fasilitas resor.
id.luxury-vacation-description-2: Nikmati perjalanan kuliner di tiga restoran dan dua bar, pulihkan diri di Sofitel FITNESS dan Sofitel SPA, dan nikmati klub anak-anak indoor dan outdoor. Selain itu, resor ini memiliki 24 ruang fungsi, termasuk sebuah Balai Besar dan Balai Tepi Pantai. Temukan kehidupan seni yang paling utama di Club Millésime, di mana hidangan lezat, anggur yang luar biasa, dan pemandangan Nusa Dua yang menakjubkan menanti Anda.
id.room-01-amenities: Pemandangan laut | Bebas rokok | Televisi | Akses Internet | Pengering rambut | Berpendingin udara
id.room-01-description: Nikmati pemandangan laut yang menakjubkan di kamar elegan ini, dilengkapi dengan kasur king dan fasilitas modern. Sempurna untuk pasangan atau keluarga kecil, kamar ini menggabungkan kemewahan dan kenyamanan.
